entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Named HttpClient not sending certificate setup in handler #109050
  • .NET 8.0.10 vs 9.0.0 RC2 GC Server Performance Regression in Sep (CSV Parser) Benchmark (due to DATAS default) #109047
  • X509CertificateLoader fails to read cat files #109046
  • Inconsistent AssemblyVersion of Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions between .NET and .NET462 #109044
    Future
  • It is impossible to implement a span-like container where JIT would elide a custom bounds check #109043
  • On x86_64, JIT could reorder numeric operations to use the flag for subsequent conditional branch but does not do so #109042
  • Certificate validation routine fails with NotTimeValid when changing time zone on Linux while client app is still running #109039

Closed

  • ILVerify fails with non-actionable uncaught exception on specific (possibly corrupt?) DLL #109037
    Future
  • [trimmer] per-RID linked corlib assembly contains foreign platform intrinsics classes #93399
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.DateOnly should Add Calculate the difference between two DateOnly methods #109041
  • Microsoft.Owin.Security.OpenIdConnect not compatible with the latest Microsoft.IdentityModel.XX packages #109032
  • Disposal of System.Threading.RateLimiting.ConcurrencyLease #93808

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Update AVX-VNNI instruction perf characteristics #109038
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

Merged

  • Define a function prototype for YieldProcessor #109028
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • use `nameof` for `CallerArgumentExpression` #109040
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add CoherentParentDependency on node packages #109022
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
